about_me:
I am a software developer with 8+ years of experience, working on various core technology like (Android Application Development, MERN Stack development, Fullstack Web development using Django and many more). And in recent years, I have developed my interest in web security to understand the security flaws in the web application and follow the best coding practices to secure the platforms. And currently doing research in API Security testing to find a vulnerability in a microservices platform and learning new tools & techniques to understand web security exploitation in-depth.

To share my work with the community, I have developed a blogging platform HackbotOne. And I publish articles related to open-source projects, application security, software development, etc. And some of my work got featured in various InfoSec & Developer communities & research conferences. You can find more information on the website.

As a hobby love to play PlayStation games in my free time and (WatchDog/WatchDog2) are some of my favourite games.
